title: PRINCE OF PERSIA: THE TWO THRONES
notes: THE GAME INSTALLS AND RUNS BUT AT THE POINT YOU GAIN CONTROL OF THE PRINCE THE CAMERA GOES INTO A CONTINUOUS ROTATION. NOT SPENT A LOT OF TIME INVESTIGATING BUT GAME IS UNPLAYABLE LIKE THIS. TRIED REDUCING SENSITIVITY AND INVERTING CAMERA CONTROL, HAD NO EFFECT. I THINK MISALIGNED GAMEPAD INPUT/SENSITIVITY SETTINGS ARE CAUSING THIS.

title: Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones
notes: Tested it for 30 minutes. Everything seems to be working fine
With gamepad connected, camera keeps spinning non stop. Without gamepad, using keyboard + mouse, the game is Platinum (flawless).
title: Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones™
